metadata.dc:author: Espinoza, Adriana Josefina Cuellar
Serna, Jose Cruz Pérez
Servin, Angel Caballero
Ortiz, Jesús Roberto Colin
metadata.dc:description: The prevalence of leptospirosis found in icteric patients negative to serological markers for hepatitis was described. 15.99 % of them were positive patients. It was observed a predominance of serovars canicola, pomona and icterohaemorrhagiae.
metadata.dc:title: Seropositividad a leptospiras en sueros de pacientes sospechosos de hepatitis viral negativos a marcadores serológicos.
[Seropositivity to leptospiras in sera from patients suspected of viral hepatitis negative to serological markers].
